original: tapyābhedagrāhiṇī tāmasī yā vṛttistasyāṃ tapya ityukta ātmā||

original: pañcaśikhenāpyuktam- 'apariṇāminī hi bhoktṛśaktirapratisaṃkramā ca pariṇāminyarthe pratisaṃkrānteva tadvṛttimanupatati' iti|

analyzed: pariṇāmini arthe buddhi tattve pratisaṃkrāntā iva prativimbitā iva tad vṛttim anupatati iti buddhau pratibimbitā sā cicchaktiḥ buddhi chāyā āpattyā buddhi vṛtti anukāravatī iti bhāvaḥ

original: tathā śuddho'pi puruṣaḥ pratyayaṃ bauddhamanupaśyati, tamanupaśyannatadātmāpi tadātmaka iva pratibhāsata iti|

original: itthaṃ tapyamānasya puruṣasyādaranairantaryadīrghakālanubandhiyamaniyamādyaṣṭāṅgayogānuṣṭhānena parameśvarapraṇidhānena ca sattvapuruṣānyatākhyātāvanupalpavāyāṃ jātāyāmavidyādayaḥ pañca kleśāḥ samūlakāṣaṃ kaṣitā bhavanti|

original: tataśca puruṣasya nirlepasya kaivalyenāvasthānaṃ kaivalyamiti siddham|

original: athaśabdasyānekārthatve saṃbhavati kathamārambhārthatvapakṣe pakṣapātaḥ saṃbhavet? athaśabdasya maṅgalādyanekārthatvaṃ nāmaliṅgānuśāsanenānuśiṣṭaṃ 'maṅgalānantarārambhapraśnakārtsnyeṣvatho atha|' (ama. ko. 3/3/246) iti|

original: atra praśnakārtsnyayorasaṃbhave'pyānantaryamaṅgalapūrvaprakṛtāpekṣārambhalakṣaṇānāṃ caturṇāmarthānāṃ saṃbhavādārambhā- rthatvānupapattiriti cet- maivaṃ maṃsthāḥ, vikalpāsahatvāt|
analyzed: atra praśna kārtsnyayoḥ asaṃbhave pi ānantarya maṅgala pūrva prakṛta apekṣā ārambha lakṣaṇānām caturṇām arthānām saṃbhavāt ārambha artha tva anupapattiḥ iti ced mā evam maṃsthāḥ vikalpa asaha tvāt

original: ānantaryamathaśabdārtha iti pakṣe yataḥ kutaścidānantaryaṃ pūrvavṛttaśamādyasādhāraṇāt kāraṇādānantaryaṃ vā|

original: (gī. 3.5) iti nyāyena sarvoṃ janturavaśyaṃ kiṃcit kṛtvā kiṃcitkarotyeveti tasyābhidhānamantareṇāpi prāptatayā tadarthāthaśabdaprayogavaiyarthyaprasakteḥ|
analyzed: iti nyāyena sarva om jantuḥ avaśyam kiṃcid kṛtvā kiṃcid karoti eva iti tasya abhidhānam antareṇa api prāptatayā tad artha atha śabda prayoga vaiyarthya prasakteḥ
na caramaḥ
śama ādi anantaram yogasya pravṛttau api tasya anuśāsana pravṛti anubandha tvena upātta tayā śabdataḥ prādhānya abhāvāt

original: na ca śabdataḥ pradhānabhūtasyānuśāsanasya śamādyānantaryamathaśabdārthaḥ kiṃ na syāditi vaditavyam|
analyzed: na ca śabdataḥ pradhāna bhūtasya anuśāsanasya śama ādi ānantaryam atha śabda arthaḥ kim na syāt iti vaditavyam
anuśāsanam iti hi śāstram āha

original: anuśiṣyate vyākhyāyate lakṣaṇabhedopāyaphalasahito yogo yena tadanuśāsanamiti vyutpatteḥ|
analyzed: anuśiṣyate vyākhyāyate lakṣaṇa bheda upāya phala sahitaḥ yogaḥ yena tat anuśāsanam iti vyutpatteḥ

original: jijñāsājñānayostu śamādyānantaryamāmnāyate- 'tasmācchānto dānta uparatastitikṣuḥ samāhito bhūtvātmanyevātmānaṃ paśyet' (bṛ.4/4/23) ityādinā|
analyzed: jijñāsā jñānayoḥ tu śama ādi ānantaryam āmnāyate tasmāt śāntaḥ dāntaḥ uparataḥ titikṣuḥ samāhitaḥ bhūtvā ātmani eva ātmānam paśyet ityādinā
nā api tattva jñāna cikhyāpayiṣā ānantaryam atha śabda arthaḥ
tasya saṃbhave api śrotṛ pratipatti pravṛttyoḥ anupayoge na anabhidheya tvāt

original: tavāpi niḥśreyasahetutayā yogānuśāsanaṃ pramitaṃ na vā|

ādye tad abhāve pi upādeya tvam bhavet

original: 'adhyātmayogādhigamena devaṃ matvā dhīro harṣaśokau jahāti|' (kā.2.12) iti śruteḥ, 'samādhāvacalā buddhistadā yogamavāpsyasi|' (gī.2/53) iti smṛteśca|
analyzed: adhyātma yoga adhigamena devam matvā dhīraḥ harṣa śokau jahāti iti śruteḥ samādhau acalā buddhiḥ tadā yogam avāpsyasi iti smṛteḥ ca

original: 'athāto brahmajijñāsā' (bra.sū.1/1/1) ityatra tu brahmajijñāsāyā anadhikāryatvenādhikārārthatvaṃ parityajya sādhanacatuṣṭayasaṃpattiviśiṣṭādhikārisamarpaṇāya śamadamādivākyavihitācchamāderanantaryamathaśabdārtha iti śaṃkarācāryairniraṭaṅki|

atha mā nāma bhūt ānantarya artha ūtha śabdaḥ

original: maṅgalārthaḥ kiṃ na syāt? na syāt maṅgalasya vākyārthe samanvayābhāvāt|
analyzed: maṅgala arthaḥ kim na syāt na syāt maṅgalasya vākya arthe samanvaya abhāvāt
agarhita abhīṣṭa avāptiḥ maṅgalam

original: tathā ca yogānuśāsanaṃ maṅgalamiti na saṃpanīpadyate, mṛdaṅgadhvanerivāthaśabdaśravaṇasya kāryatayā maṅgalasya vācyatvalakṣyatvayorasaṃbhavācca|
analyzed: tathā ca yoga anuśāsanam maṅgalam iti na saṃpanīpadyate mṛdaṅga dhvaneḥ iva atha śabda śravaṇasya kārya tayā maṅgalasya vācya tva lakṣya tvayoḥ asaṃbhavāt ca

original: yathārthikārthoṃ vākyārthe na niviśate tathā kāryamapi na niviśeta|
analyzed: yathā ārthika arthaḥ om vākya arthe na niviśate tathā kāryam api na niviśeta
apadārtha tva aviśeṣāt
padārthaḥ eva hi vākya arthe samanvīyate

original: anyathā śabdapramāṇakānāṃ 'śābdī hyākāṅkṣā śabdenaiva pūryata' iti mudrābhaṅgaḥ kṛto bhavet|
analyzed: anyathā śabdapramāṇakānām śābdī hi ākāṅkṣā śabdena eva pūryate iti mudrābhaṅgaḥ kṛtaḥ bhavet

original: nanu prāripsitaprabandha- parisamāptiparipanthipratyūhavyūhapraśamanāya śiṣṭācāra paripālanāya ca śāstrārambhe maṅgalācaraṇamanuṣṭeyam|

original: 'maṅgalādīni maṅgalamadhyāni maṅgalāntāni ca śāstrāṇi prathante, āyuṣmatpuruṣakāṇi vīrapuruṣakāṇi ca bhavanti' (pāta.mā.bhā. 1/3/1) ityabhiyuktokteḥ|
analyzed: maṅgala ādīni maṅgala madhyāni maṅgala antāni ca śāstrāṇi prathante āyuṣmat puruṣakāṇi vīra puruṣakāṇi ca bhavanti iti abhiyukta ukteḥ

original: bhavati ca maṅgalārtho'thaśabdaḥ- 'oṃkāraścāthaśabdaśca dvāvetau brahmaṇaḥ purā|
analyzed: bhavati ca maṅgala arthā utha śabdaḥ oṃkāraḥ ca atha śabdaḥ ca dvau etau brahmaṇaḥ purā

analyzed: kaṇṭham bhittvā viniryātau tasmāt māṅgalikau ubhau iti smṛti saṃbhavāt

original: tathā ca 'vṛddhirādaic' ( pā.sū.1/1/1) ityādau vṛddhayādiśabdavadathaśabdo maṅgalārthaḥ syāditi cet- maivaṃ bhāṣiṣṭhāḥ|

artha antara abhidhānāya prayuktasya atha śabdasya vīṇā veṇu ādi dhvani vat śravaṇa mātreṇa maṅgala phalatva upapatteḥ
atha artha antara ārambha vākya artha dhī phalaka sya athaśabdasya katham anya phalaka tā iti ced na
anya artham nīyamāna uda ku mbha upalambha vat tad saṃbhavāt
na ca smṛti vyākopaḥ
māṅgalikau iti maṅgala prayojana tva vivakṣayā pravṛtteḥ
na api pūrva prakṛta apekṣā ūtha śabdaḥ

original: kimaya- mathaśabdo'dhikārārtho'thānantaryārtha ityādivimarśavākye pakṣāntaropanyāse tatsaṃbhave'pi prakṛte tadasaṃbhavācca|

original: yathā 'athaiṣa jyotirathaiṣa viśvajyotiḥ' ityatrāthaśabdaḥ krataviśeṣaprārambhārthaḥ parigṛhīto yathā ca 'atha śabdānuśāsanam ( pāta ma.bhā. 1/1) ityatrāthaśabdo vyākaraṇaśāstrādhikārarthastadvat|

original: tadabhāṣi vyāsabhāṣye yogasūtravivaraṇapare athetyayamadhikārārthaḥ prayujyata iti|

tat ittham amuṣya atha śabdasya adhikāra artha tva pakṣe śāstreṇa prastūyamānasya yogasya upavartanāt samasta śāstra tātparya artha vyākhyānena śiṣyasya sukha avabodha pravṛttiḥ bhavati iti atha śabdasya adhikāra artha tvam upapannam
nanu hiraṇyagarbhaḥ om yogasya vaktā nā anyaḥ purātanaḥ

original: iti yājñavalkyasmṛteḥ patañjaliḥ kathaṃ yogasya śāsiteti cet- addhā|
analyzed: iti yājñavalkya smṛteḥ patañjaliḥ katham yogasya śāsitā iti ced addhā

original: ata eva tatra tatra purāṇādau viśiṣya yogasya viprakīrṇatayā durgrāhyārthatvaṃ manyamānena bhagavatā kṛpāsindhunā phaṇipatinā sāraṃ saṃjighṛkṣuṇānuśāsanamārabdhaṃ na tu sākṣācchāsanam|
analyzed: atas eva tatra tatra purāṇa ādau viśiṣya yogasya viprakīrṇa tayā durgrāhya artha tvam manyamānena bhagavatā kṛpā sindhunā phaṇi patinā sāram saṃjighṛkṣuṇā anuśāsanam ārabdham na tu sākṣāt śāsanam

original: yadāyamathaśabdo'dhikārārtha- stadaivaṃ vākyārthaḥ saṃpadyate - yogānuśāsanaṃ śāstramadhikṛtaṃ veditavyamiti|
analyzed: yadā ayam atha śabda udhikāra arthaḥ stadā evam vākya arthaḥ saṃpadyate yoga anuśāsanam śāstram adhikṛtam veditavyam iti
tasmāt ayam atha śabdaḥ dhikāra dyotakaḥ maṅgala arthaḥ ca iti siddham

original: tatra śāstre vyutpādyamānatayā yogaḥ sasādhanaḥ saphalo viṣayaḥ|
analyzed: tatra śāstre vyutpādyamāna tayā yogaḥ sa sādhanaḥ sa phalaḥ viṣayaḥ
vyutpāditasya yogasya kaivalyam parama prayojanam
śāstra yogayoḥ pratipādya pratipādaka bhāva lakṣaṇaḥ saṃbandhaḥ
yogasya kaivalyasya ca sādhya sādhana bhāva lakṣaṇaḥ saṃbandhaḥ
sa ca śruti ādi prasiddhaḥ iti prāk eva avādiṣam
mokṣam apekṣamāṇāḥ eva adhikāriṇaḥ iti artha siddham
na ca atha atas brahma jijñāsā ityādau adhikāriṇaḥ ūrthataḥ siddhiḥ āśaṅkanīyā
tatra atha śabdena ānantarya abhidhāna praṇāḍikayā adhikāri samarpaṇa siddhau ārthika tva śaṅkā anudayāt
atas eva uktam śruti prāpte prakaraṇa ādīnām anavakāśaḥ iti

original: asyārthaḥ - yatra hi śrutyārthoṃ na labhyate tatraiva prakaraṇādayo'rthaṃ samarpayanti, netaratra|
analyzed: asya arthaḥ yatra hi śrutyā arthaḥ om na labhyate tatra eva prakaraṇāt ayaḥ ṛtham samarpayanti na itaratra
yatra tu śabdāt eva arthasya upalambhaḥ tatra na itarasya saṃbhavaḥ
śīghra bodhinyā śrutyā viniyogasya bodhanena nirākāṅkṣa tayā itareṣām anavakāśāt

original: kiṃ ca, śrutyā bodhite'rthaṃ tadviruddhārthe prakaraṇādi samarpayatyaviruddhaṃ vā? na prathamaḥ, viruddhārthabodhakasya tasya bādhitatvat|
analyzed: kim ca śrutyā bodhita īrtham tad viruddha arthe prakaraṇa ādi samarpayati aviruddham vā na prathamaḥ viruddha artha bodhakasya tasya bādhita tvat
na caramaḥ vaiyarthyāt
tat āha śruti liṅga vākya prakaraṇa sthāna samākhyānām samavāye pāra daurbalyam artha viprakarṣāt iti
bādhikā eva śrutiḥ nityam samākhyā bādhyate sadā

original: madhyamānāṃ tu bādhyatvaṃ bādhakatvamapekṣayā||' iti ca|
analyzed: madhyamānām tu bādhya tvam bādhaka tvam apekṣayā iti ca
tasmāt viṣaya ādimattvāt brahma vicāraka śāstra vat yoga anuśāsanam śāstram ārambhaṇīyam iti sthitam

original: nanu vyutpādyamānatayā yoga evātra prastuto na śāstramiti cet- satyam|
analyzed: nanu vyutpādyamāna tayā yogaḥ eva atra prastutaḥ na śāstram iti ced satyam
pratipādya tayā yogaḥ pradhānyena prastutaḥ

original: sa ca tadviṣayeṇa śāstreṇa pratipādyata iti tatpratipādane karaṇaṃ śāstram|
analyzed: sa ca tad viṣayeṇa śāstreṇa pratipādyate iti tad pratipādane karaṇam śāstram
karaṇa gocaraḥ ca kartṛ vyāpāraḥ na karma gocara tām ācarati

original: yathā chetturdevadattasya vyāpārabhūtamudyamana- nipātanādikarma karaṇabhūtaparaśugocaraṃ na karmabhūtavṛkṣādigocaram|
analyzed: yathā chettuḥ devadattasya vyāpāra bhūtam udyamana nipātana ādi karma karaṇa bhūta paraśu gocaram na karma bhūta vṛkṣa ādi gocaram

original: tathā ca vaktuḥ patañjaleḥ pravacanavyāpārāpekṣayā yogaviṣayasyādhikṛtatā karaṇasya śāstrasya|
analyzed: tathā ca vaktuḥ patañjaleḥ pravacana vyāpāra apekṣayā yoga viṣayasya adhikṛta tā karaṇasya śāstrasya
abhidhāna vyāpāra apekṣayā tu yogasya eva iti vibhāgaḥ
tatas ca yoga śāstrasya ārambhaḥ saṃbhāvanām bhajate
atra ca anuśāsanīyaḥ yogaḥ citta vṛtti nirodhaḥ iti ucyate

original: nanu yujiryoṃga iti saṃyogārthatayā paripaṭhitādyujerniṣpanno yogaśabdaḥ saṃyogavacana eva syānna tu nirodhavacanaḥ|
analyzed: nanu yujiḥ yoṃgaḥ iti saṃyoga artha tayā paripaṭhitāt yujeḥ niṣpannaḥ yoga śabdaḥ saṃyoga vacanaḥ eva syāt na tu nirodha vacanaḥ

original: ata evoktaṃ yājñavalkyena - saṃyogo yoga ityukto jīvātmaparamātmanoḥ|

pratyamuñjat pinaddhavān
asaścatā abhyapūjayat

original: yathā cikitsāśāstraṃ rogo rogaheturārogyaṃ bheṣajamiti tathedamapi saṃsāraḥ saṃsāraheturmoṃkṣo mokṣopāya iti|
analyzed: yathā cikitsā śāstram rogaḥ roga hetuḥ ārogyam bheṣajam iti tathā idam api saṃsāraḥ saṃsāra hetuḥ moṃkṣaḥ mokṣa upāyaḥ iti
tatra duḥkha mayaḥ saṃsāraḥ heyaḥ
pradhāna puruṣayoḥ saṃyogaḥ heya bhoga hetuḥ
tasya ātyantikī nivṛttiḥ hānam
tad upāyaḥ samyak darśanam
evam anyat api śāstram yathāsaṃbhavam catur vyūham ūhanīyam iti sarvam avadātam
iti śrīmat sāyaṇa mādhavīye sarva darśana saṃgrahe pātañjala darśanam
atha śāṃkara darśanam
saḥ uyam pariṇāma vādaḥ prāmāṇika garhaṇam arhati

original: suvarṇādau rucakādyupādāne hemakārādicetanādhiṣṭhānopalambhena nityatvasādhakakṛtakatvavatsukhaduḥkha- mohātmanānvitatvādeḥ sādhanasya sādhyaviparyayavyāptatayā viruddhatvāt svarūpāsiddhatvācca|
analyzed: suvarṇa ādau rucaka ādi upādāne hemakāra ādi cetanā adhiṣṭhāna upalambhena nitya tva sādhaka kṛtaka tva vat sukha duḥkha moha ātmanā anvita tva ādeḥ sādhanasya sādhya viparyaya vyāpta tayā viruddha tvāt svarūpa asiddha tvāt ca

original: āntarāḥ khalvamī sukhaduḥkhamohā bāhyebhyaścandanādibhyo vibhinnapratyayavedanīyebhyo vyatiriktā adhyakṣamīkṣyante|
analyzed: āntarāḥ khalu amī sukha duḥkha mohāḥ bāhyebhyaḥ candana ādibhyaḥ vibhinna pratyaya vedanīyebhyaḥ vyatiriktāḥ adhyakṣam īkṣyante

original: yadyamī sukhādisvabhāvā bhaveyustadā hemantepi candanaḥ sukhaḥ syāt|
analyzed: yadi amī sukha ādi svabhāvāḥ bhaveyuḥ tadā hemante pi candanaḥ sukhaḥ syāt
na hi candanaḥ kadācid acandanaḥ

na hi asau kadācid a kuṅkuma paṅkaḥ iti

original: evaṃ kaṇṭakaḥ kramelakasyeva manuṣyādīnāmapi prāṇabhṛtāṃ sukhaḥ syāt|
analyzed: evam kaṇṭakaḥ kramelakasya iva manuṣya ādīnām api prāṇabhṛtām sukhaḥ syāt

original: tasmāccandanakuṅkumādayo viśeṣāḥ kālaviśeṣādyapekṣayā sukhādihetavo na tu sukhādisvabhāvā iti ramaṇīyam|
analyzed: tasmāt candana kuṅkuma ādayaḥ viśeṣāḥ kāla viśeṣa ādi apekṣayā sukha ādi hetavaḥ na tu sukha ādi svabhāvāḥ iti ramaṇīyam
tasmāt hetuḥ asiddhaḥ iti siddham
nā api śrutiḥ prādhāna kāraṇa tva vādeḥ pramāṇam

original: yataḥ- yadagne rohitaṃ rūpaṃ tejasastadrūpaṃ yacchuklaṃ tadapāṃ yatkṛṣṇaṃ tadannasya (chā06/4/1) iti cchāndogyaśākhāyāṃ tejobannātmikāyāḥ prakṛterlohitaśuklakṛṣṇarūpāṇi samāmnātāni tānyevātra pratyabhijñāyante|
analyzed: yatas yat agneḥ rohitam rūpam tejasaḥ tat rūpam yat śuklam tat apām yat kṛṣṇam tat annasya iti chāndogya śākhāyām tejaḥ banna ātmikāyāḥ prakṛteḥ lohita śukla kṛṣṇa rūpāṇi samāmnātāni tāni eva atra pratyabhijñāyante

original: tatra śrautapratyabhijñāyāḥ prābalyāllohitādiśabdānāṃ mukhyārthasaṃbhavācca tejobannātmikā jarāyujāṇḍaja- svedajodbhijjacatuṣṭayasya bhūtagrāmasya prakṛtiravasīyate|
analyzed: tatra śrauta pratyabhijñāyāḥ prābalyāt lohita ādi śabdānām mukhya artha saṃbhavāt ca tejaḥ banna ātmikā jarāyu ja aṇḍa ja sveda ja udbhid ja catuṣṭayasya bhūta grāmasya prakṛtiḥ avasīyate

original: yadyapi tejobannānāṃ prakṛterjātatvena yogavṛttyā na jāyata ityajatvaṃ na sidhyati tathāpi ruḍhivṛttyāvagatamajātvamuktaprakṛtau sukhāvabodhāya prakalpyate|
analyzed: yadi api tejaḥ bannānām prakṛteḥ jāta tvena yogavṛttyā na jāyate iti aja tvam na sidhyati tathā api ruḍhi vṛttyā avagatam ajā tvam ukta prakṛtau sukha avabodhāya prakalpyate

original: yathā asau vādityo devamadhu (chā.3/1/1) ityādivākyenādityasya madhutvaṃ parikalpyate tathā tejobannātmikā prakṛtirevājeti|
analyzed: yathā asau vā ādityaḥ deva madhu ityādi vākyena ādityasya madhu tvam parikalpyate tathā tejaḥ banna ātmikā prakṛtiḥ eva ajā iti
atas jām ekām ityādikā śrutiḥ api na pradhāna pratipādikā

original: yadavādi nidarśanaṃ pūrvavādinā kṣīrādikamacetanaṃ cetanānadhiṣṭhitameva vatsavivṛddhayarthaṃ pravartata iti|
analyzed: yat avādi nidarśanam pūrvavādinā kṣīra ādikam acetanam cetanā anadhiṣṭhitam eva vatsa vivṛddhaya rtham pravartate iti
na etat ramaṇīyam
buddhi viśeṣa śālinaḥ parameśvarasya tatra api adhiṣṭhātṛ tva abhyupagamāt

original: na ca parameśvarasya karuṇayā pravṛttyaṅgīkāre prāguktavikalpāvasaraḥ|
analyzed: na ca parameśvarasya karuṇayā pravṛtti aṅgīkāre prāc ukta vikalpa avasaraḥ

original: sṛṣṭeḥ prāk prāṇināṃ duḥkhasaṃbandhāsaṃbhavepi tannidānādṛṣṭasaṃbandhasaṃbhavena tatprahāṇecchayā pravṛttyupapatteḥ|
analyzed: sṛṣṭeḥ prāk prāṇinām duḥkha saṃbandha asaṃbhave pi tad nidāna adṛṣṭa saṃbandha saṃbhavena tad prahāṇa icchayā pravṛtti upapatteḥ
kim ca puruṣa artha prayuktā pradhāna pravṛttiḥ iti uktam tat vivektavyam

original: kiṃ pradhānaṃ ke valaṃ bhogārthe pravartate|
analyzed: kim pradhānam ke bhoga arthe pravartate
kim vā ke vala mokṣa artham āhosvit ubhaya artham
na tāvat ādyaḥ kalpaḥ uvakalpate
anādheya atiśayasya kū ṭastha nityasya puruṣasya tāttvi bhoga asaṃbhavāt
a nirmoṃkṣa prasaṅgāt ca

original: yena hi prayojanena pradhānaṃ pravartitaṃ tadanena vidhātavyam|
analyzed: yena hi prayojanena pradhānam pravartitam tat anena vidhātavyam
bhogena ca etat pravartitam iti tam eva vidadhyāt na mokṣam iti
na api dvitīyaḥ

original: ciddhātornityaśuddhabuddhamuktasvabhāvatayā karmānubhavavāsanānāmasaṃbhavena pradhānapravṛtteḥ prāgapi muktatayā tadarthaṃ pravṛttyanupapatteḥ|
analyzed: cit dhātoḥ nitya śuddha buddha mukta svabhāva tayā karma anubhava vāsanānām asaṃbhavena pradhāna pravṛtteḥ prāk api mukta tayā tad artham pravṛtti anupapatteḥ
śabda ādi upabhoga artham apravṛtta tvena pradhānasya tad ajanaka tva prasaṅgāt ca
na api tṛtīyaḥ
prāc ukta dūṣaṇa laṅghana ālaṅghita tvāt
pravṛtti svabhāvāyāḥ prakṛteḥ audāsīnya ayogāt ca
nanu sattva puruṣa anyathā khyātiḥ puruṣa arthaḥ

original: tasyāṃ jātāyāṃ sā nivartate kṛtakāryatvāditi cet- tadasamañjasam|
analyzed: tasyām jātāyām sā nivartate kṛta kārya tvāt iti ced tat asamañjasam
acetanāyāḥ prakṛteḥ vicārya kārya kāri tva ayogāt

original: yatheyaṃ kṛtepi śabdādyupalambhe tadarthaṃ punaḥ pravartata evamatrāpi punaḥ pravarteta|
analyzed: yathā iyam kṛte api śabda ādi upalambhe tad artham punar pravartate evam atra api punar pravarteta

original: kiṃ ca sā prakṛtirvivekakhyātivaśāducchidyate na vā|
analyzed: kim ca sā prakṛtiḥ viveka khyāti vaśāt ucchidyate na vā

an ucche de na kasyacid mokṣaḥ

original: nanu pradhānābhedepi tattatpuruṣāvivekakhyātilakṣaṇavidyāsadasattvanibandhanau bandhamokṣāvupapadyeyātāmiti cet- hanta tarhi kṛtaṃ prakṛtyā|
analyzed: nanu pradhāna abhede pi tat tat puruṣa aviveka khyāti lakṣaṇa vidyā sat asattva nibandhanau bandha mokṣau upapadyeyātām iti ced hanta tarhi kṛtam prakṛtyā
avidyā sat asat bhāvābhyām eva tad upapatteḥ
nanu avidyā pakṣe pi eṣa doṣaḥ prāduḥṣyāt iti ced tat etat pratyavasthānam asthāne

original: na hi vayaṃ pradhānavadavidyāṃ sarveṣu jīveṣvekāmācakṣmahe yenaivamupālabhyemahi|
analyzed: na hi vayam pradhāna vat avidyām sarveṣu jīveṣu ekām ācakṣmahe yena evam upālabhyemahi

original: tena yasyaiva jīvasya vidyotpadyate tasyaivāvidyāsamucchidyate nānyasya|

atas na samasta saṃsāra ucche da prasaṅga doṣaḥ
tasmāt pariṇāmaḥ parityaktavyaḥ
svīkartavyaḥ ca vivarta vādaḥ

original: nanu jīvajaḍayoḥ sārūpyābhāvena cidvivartatvaṃ prapañcasya na saṃparipadyate iti prāgavādiṣmeti cet- naitatsādhu|

original: kiṃ ca kādācitke vibhrame sārūpyāpekṣā nānādyavidyānibandhane prapañce|

tat avocat ācārya vācaspatiḥ
vivartaḥ tu prapañcaḥ yam
anādi vāsanā udbhūtaḥ na sārūpyam apekṣate

original: bhagavatā bādarāyaṇena praṇītasya vedāntaśāstrasya pratyagbrahmaikyaṃ viṣaya iti śaṃkarācāryāḥ pratyapīpadan|

analyzed: tatra prathame samanvaya adhyāye sarveṣām vedāntānām brahmaṇi tātparyeṇa paryavasānam

original: tatra prathamasyādhyāyasya prathame pāde spaṣṭabrahmaliṅgaṃ vākyajātaṃ mīmāṃsyate|

tṛtīye tādṛśam jñeya viṣayam
saṃdigdham pada jātam iti
avirodhasya dvitīyasya prathame sāṃkhya yoga kaṇāda ādi smṛti virodha parihāraḥ

caturthe liṅga śarīra śrutīnām virodha parihāraḥ
tṛtīyasya prathame jīvasya para loka gamana āgamana vicāra puraḥsaram vairāgyam
tṛtīye saguṇa vidyāsu guṇa upasaṃhāraḥ
caturthe nirguṇa brahma vidyāyāḥ bahiraṃga antaraṃga āśrama yajña śama ādi sādhana jātam

original: caturthasya prathame brahmasākṣātkāreṇa jīvataḥ pāpapuṇyakleśavaidhuryalakṣaṇā muktiḥ|

dvitīye maraṇa utkramaṇa prakāraḥ
tṛtīye saguṇa brahma upāsakasya uttara mārgaḥ
caturthe nirguṇa saguṇa brahma vidaḥ videhakaiḥ valya brahmaloka avasthānāni
tat ittham brahma vicāra śāstra adhyāya pāda artha saṃgrahaḥ
tatra prathamam adhikaraṇam atha atas brahma jijñāsā iti brahma mīmāṃsā ārambha upapādana param
adhikaraṇam ca pañca avayavam prasiddham
te ca viṣaya ādayaḥ pañca avayavāḥ nirūpyante
ātmā vāre draṣṭavyaḥ iti etat vākyam viṣayaḥ
brahma jijñāsitavyam na vā iti saṃdehaḥ
jijñāsya tva vyāpakayoḥ saṃdeha prayojanayoḥ saṃbhava asaṃbhavābhyām
tatra kasya idam jijñāsya tvam avagamyate
aham anubhava gamyasya śruti gamyasya vā
na ādyaḥ

original: athocceta yathā pīlupākapakṣe piṭharapākapakṣe vā kālabhedenaikāsminvastuni pākajabhedo yujyate tathaikasmiñśarīrābhidhe vastuni kālabhedena parimāṇabhedaḥ|
analyzed: atha ucceta yathā pīlu pāka pakṣe piṭhara pāka pakṣe vā kāla bhedena ekā asmin vastuni pāka ja bhedaḥ yujyate tathā ekasmin śarīra abhidhe vastuni kāla bhedena parimāṇa bhedaḥ

original: ata eva laukikāḥ śarīramātmanaḥ sakāśādabhinnaṃ pratipadyamānāḥ pratyabhijānate ceti|
analyzed: atas eva laukikāḥ śarīram ātmanaḥ sakāśāt abhinnam pratipadyamānāḥ pratyabhijānate ca iti

maṇi mantra auṣadha ādi upāya bhedena bhūmikā ādhāna vat nānāvidhān dehān pratipadyamānasya aham ālambanasya bhinnasya ātmanaḥ śarīrāt bhedena bhāsamāna tvāt

original: nānyadṛṣṭaṃ smaratyanyaḥ (nyā.ku su 1/15) iti nyāyena cakṣurādau naṣṭepi rūpādipratisaṃdhānānupapatteḥ|
analyzed: na anya dṛṣṭam smarati anyaḥ iti nyāyena cakṣuḥ ādau naṣṭe api rūpa ādi pratisaṃdhāna anupapatteḥ

original: ayameva bhedo bhedaheturvā yadviruddhadharmādhyāsaḥ kāraṇabhedaśceti nyāyena kartṛkaraṇabhūtayorātmāntaḥkaraṇayostakṣavāsivatsaṃbhedāsaṃbhavāt|
analyzed: ayam eva bhedaḥ bheda hetuḥ vā yat viruddha dharma adhyāsaḥ kāraṇa bhedaḥ ca iti nyāyena kartṛ karaṇa bhūtayoḥ ātma antaḥkaraṇayoḥ takṣa vāsi vat saṃbheda asaṃbhavāt

original: yadyabhedaeva nādriyate tarhi sthūlohaṃ kṛśohaṃ kṛṣṇohamityādi saṃkhyānamutsannasaṃkathaṃ syāt|

analyzed: tasmāt āvidyakaḥ bhedaḥ iti śrutau advitīya tva upapattaye abhidhīyate na tu vyasani tayā

original: yadi vastutaḥ sarvoṃpadravarahitamātmatattvaṃ tarhi kathaṃkāraṃ dehādirūpaṃ kārāgāraṃ kāraṃkāraṃ punaḥpunastatra praviśati|
analyzed: yadi vastutas sarva upadrava rahitam ātma tattvam tarhi kathaṃkāram deha ādi rūpam kārāgāram kāraṃkāram punar punar tatra praviśati
tat ati phalgu
avidyāyāḥ anādi tvena datta uttara tvāt
atas nivṛtti upāyaḥ eva anveṣaṇīyaḥ prekṣāvatā
na tu vismayaḥ kartavyaḥ
tatas ca tattvamasyādi vidyayā tad avidyā nivṛttau niratiśaya ānanda ātma lābha rūpa parama puruṣa arthaḥ setsyati

original: tathā cāpastambasmṛtiḥ - ātmalābhānna paraṃ vidyata iti|
analyzed: tathā ca āpastamba smṛtiḥ ātma lābhāt na param vidyate iti
nanu asau nitya labdhaḥ
na hi svayam eva svasya ālabdhaḥ bhavati
satyam
kim tu anādi māyā saṃbandhāt kṣīrodaka vat samudācāra vṛtti tām na labhate

original: tathā ca yathā śabarādibhirbālyā- tsvasutaiḥ saha vardhito rājaputrastajjātīyamātmānamavagacchanbandhubhirya evaṃbhūto rājā sa tvamasīti bodhite svarūpe labdhasvarūpa iva bhavati tathā veśyāsthānīyayānādyavidyayā svabhāvāntaraṃ nīta ātmā mātṛsthānīyayā tattvamasītyādikayā śrutyā svabhāvaṃ nīyate etadāhustraividyavṛddhāḥ - nīcānāṃ vasato tadīyatanayai sārdhaṃ ciraṃ vardhitastajjātīyamavaiti rājatanayaḥ svātmānamapyañjasā|
analyzed: tathā ca yathā śabara ādibhiḥ bālyāt sva sutaiḥ saha vardhitaḥ rāja putraḥ tad jātīyam ātmānam avagacchan bandhubhiḥ yaḥ evaṃbhūtaḥ rājā sa tvam asi iti bodhite sva rūpe labdha sva rūpaḥ iva bhavati tathā veśyā sthānīyayā anādya vidyayā svabhāva antaram nītaḥ ātmā mātṛ sthānīyayā tat tvam asi iti ādikayā śrutyā svabhāvam nīyate etat āhuḥ traividya vṛddhāḥ nīcānām tadīya tanayai sārdham ciram vardhitaḥ tad jātīyam avaiti rāja tana

original: saṃvāde mahadādibhiḥ saha vasaṃstadvadbhavetpuruṣaḥ svātmānaṃ sukhaduḥkhajālakalitaṃ mithyaiva dhiṅmanyate||
analyzed: saṃvāde mahat ādibhiḥ saha vasan tadvat bhavet puruṣaḥ sva ātmānam sukha duḥkha jāla kalitam mithyā eva dhik manyate

original: dātā bhogaparaḥ samagravibhavo yaḥ śāsitā duṣkṛtām rājā sa tvamasīti rakṣitṛmukhācchrutvā yathāvatsa tu|
analyzed: dātā bhoga paraḥ samagra vibhavaḥ yaḥ śāsitā duṣkṛtām rājā sa tvam asi iti rakṣitṛ mukhāt śrutvā yathāvat sa tu

original: rājībhūya jayārthameva yatate tadvatpumānbodhitaḥ śrutyā tattvamasītyapāsya duritaṃ brahmaiva saṃpadyate||
analyzed: rājībhūya jaya artham eva yatate tadvat pumān bodhitaḥ śrutyā tat tvam asi iti apāsya duritam brahma eva saṃpadyate

original: etenaitatpratyuktaṃ yaduktaṃ paraiḥ kiṃ dvayostādātmyamekasya vā|

na ādyaḥ
advaita bhaṅga prasaṅgāt
na dvitīyaḥ
asaṃbhavāt iti

original: tataśca tattvamasīti tattvaṃpadārthaśravaṇamananabhāvanābalabhuvā sākṣātkāreṇānādyavidyānivṛttau saccidānandaikarasavrahmāvirbhāvaḥ saṃpatsyata iti brahmaṇo jijñāsyatvaṃ prathamasūtroktaṃ yuktam|
analyzed: tatas ca tat tvam asi iti tat tvam padārtha śravaṇa manana bhāvanā bala bhuvā sākṣātkāreṇa anādya vidyā nivṛttau saccidānanda eka rasa vrahma āvirbhāvaḥ saṃpatsyate iti brahmaṇaḥ jijñāsya tvam prathama sūtra uktam yuktam

original: ajñātaṃ viṣayo brahma jñātaṃ tacca prayojanam|
analyzed: ajñātam viṣayaḥ brahma jñātam tat ca prayojanam

original: janmādyasya yataḥ (bra.sū.1/1/2) iti dvitīyasūtre brahma svarūpalakṣaṇataṭasthalakṣaṇābhyāṃ nyarūpi|

original: tatra svarūpāntargatatve sati vyāvartakaṃ svarūpalakṣaṇaṃ satyaṃ jñānamanantaṃ brahma (tai.2/1/1) ityādi vedāntaiḥ pratipāditam|

taṭastha lakṣaṇam yatas vai imāni
ityādīni vākyāni nirūpayanti jagat janma ādi kāraṇatvena

original: taduktaṃ vivaraṇe - jagajjanmasthitidhvaṃsā yataḥ sidhyanti kāraṇāt|

analyzed: tad svarūpa taṭa sthābhyām lakṣaṇābhyām pradarśyate

original: śāstrayonitvāt ( bra.sū. 1/1/3) iti tṛtīyasūtre prathamavarṇake na ṣaṣṭhīsamāsamāśritya sarvajñatvaṃ pratyapādi|
analyzed: śāstra yoni tvāt brasū iti tṛtīya sūtre prathama varṇake na ṣaṣṭhī samāsam āśritya sarvajña tvam pratyapādi

original: dvitīyavarṇake na bahubrīhi samāsamabhyupagamya brahmaṇo vedāṃntapramāṇakatvaṃ pratyajñāyi|
analyzed: dvitīya varṇake na bahubrīhi samāsam abhyupagamya brahmaṇaḥ vedāṃnta pramāṇaka tvam pratyajñāyi

original: tattu samanvayāt ( bra.sū.1/1/4) iti caturthe sūtre prathamavarṇake na vedāntānāṃ brahmaṇi tātparyaṃ pratyapādi|
